lyrics:
Hit you up, late at night
All I want is to get high


Feel the wind in my hair
I need to feel alive

Up all night by your side
I′m not preoccupied

Through the dark, feels so good
No one but me and you

And I want you in the summer light
And I need you 'til the sun goes down
I′ll be with you in my paradise
'Cause I need you 'til the sun goes down

And I want you in the summer light
And I need you ′til the sun goes down
I′ll be with you in my paradise
'Cause I need you ′til the sun goes down

('Til the sun goes)

(Sun goes, sun goes, sun goes)
(′Til the sun goes down)

('Til the sun goes)

(Sun goes, sun goes, sun goes)

Hold me close, feel my fire
Our heartbeats synced all night
Feel the tides lead my life
Kiss me once, I′ll kiss you twice

Up all night by your side
I'm not preoccupied
Through the dark, feel so good
No one but me and you

And I want you in the summer light
And I need you 'til the sun goes down
I′ll be with you in my paradise
′Cause I need you 'til the sun goes down

And I want you in the summer light
And I need you ′til the sun goes down
I'll be with you in my paradise
′Cause I need you 'til the sun goes down

(′Til the sun goes)
(Sun goes, sun goes, sun goes)
('Til the sun goes down)

('Til the sun goes)
(Sun goes, sun goes, sun goes)

′Til the sun goes down
imageDescription: A vibrant sunset on a tropical beach, with palm trees swaying in the breeze. The sky is filled with hues of orange, pink, and purple, reflecting off the calm waters. Two figures stand close together, silhouetted against the colorful backdrop, their arms wrapped around each other as they watch the sun slowly sink below the horizon.
